thread.section_title: Hotel Diva Opera - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Highly recommended
thread.title_full: Highly recommended - Review of Hotel Diva Opera, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: HMB 1
title: Highly recommended
text:
Great location - top destinations close by, metro links accessible also.
There are amazing bars, cafes and restaurants in every direction.
The boutique style room was clean, modern and had a nice bay window. The staff are helpful, friendly and pleasant.
I loved the spiral stair case!
This hotel is the perfect place to rest after getting lost in Paris for a long weekend.
Thank you to everyone at Hotel Diva Opera who made the stay so welcoming and enjoyable.
